Title: Yesterday, Today and Tomorrow
Writer: Eduardo De Filippo (story), Eduardo De Filippo (screenplay), Isabella Quarantotti (screenplay), Alberto Moravia (novel), Cesare Zavattini (screenplay), Bella Billa (screenplay), Lorenza Zanuso (screenplay), Cesare Zavattini (story), Cesare Zavattini (screenplay)
Actors: Sophia Loren, Marcello Mastroianni, Aldo Giuffrè, Agostino Salvietti
Plot: Stories about three very different women and the men they attract.
